subject: Football
Concussions
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Jahvid Best, California’s star tailback, will not play in the Big Game against No. 14 Stanford on Saturday as he recovers from a concussion.
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Jahvid Best, California’s star tailback, will not play in the Big Game against No. 14 Stanford on Saturday as he recovers from a concussion.
